title: Spicy Chicken and Roasted Mediterranean Vegetable Couscous
ingredients: ['2 skinless boneless chicken breasts', '1 red pepper', '1 green pepper', '1 courgette', '1 red onion', '1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 rashers unsmoked back bacon', '1 tablespoon hot chilli powder', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon dried mixed herbs', '1 clove garlic', '300g couscous']
